data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in San Luis Potosí, Mexico by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San Luis Potosí, Mexico

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 2,391,900 citizens of San Luis Potosí, Mexico, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of San Luis Potosí to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 250,647 believers in San Luis Potosí, Mexico a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Japanese people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 2,391,900 people living in San Luis Potosí.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of San Luis Potosí words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 250,647 believers in San Luis Potosí against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
